intelligence.target_persona: Luxury homeowners and eco-conscious architects seeking high-end energy integration

brand.name: Aura Electric & Solar
brand.tagline: Powering the Future, Preserving the Grid
brand.objection_handle: Licensed, Bonded, and 100% Carbon Neutral since 2018.

hero.headline: Smart Energy Systems for Modern Living
hero.subtext: Architectural-grade solar integration and Tesla Powerwall systems that look as good as they perform.

image.alt: Modern luxury home with integrated solar roof at dusk
image.image_search_query: modern luxury home solar panels night dusk

about.story_text: Aura Electric & Solar was founded to bridge the gap between industrial-strength electrical engineering and the aesthetic demands of high-end residential architecture. We don't just install panels; we design energy ecosystems.
about.founder_note: Energy should be as beautiful as the home it powers. Our mission is to provide energy independence without compromising on design.
about.years_experience: Over 15 years of master-level electrical engineering and solar design.

features.title: Tesla Powerwall Certified
features.description: Expert integration of battery backup systems for 24/7 energy independence.

features.title: Architectural Solar
features.description: Custom-designed arrays that complement your home's unique roofline and aesthetic.

features.title: Smart Grid Monitoring
features.description: Real-time energy tracking via custom mobile dashboards for every installation.

features.title: EV Infrastructure
features.description: High-speed charging solutions integrated directly into your home's solar ecosystem.

features.title: Net-Zero Consulting
features.description: Comprehensive energy audits to help you achieve a 100% carbon-neutral lifestyle.

contact.headline: Own Your Power.
contact.subheadline: Contact Aura today for a comprehensive energy consultation and site audit.

items.label: Licensed & Bonded
items.sublabel: Top-tier insurance and certification for total peace of mind.

items.label: Efficiency First
items.sublabel: We maximize every square inch of solar exposure.

items.label: Aesthetic First
items.sublabel: No bulky rails or visible conduits?just clean design.

processSteps.title: Energy Consultation
processSteps.description: We analyze your current consumption and architectural goals.

processSteps.title: Custom Engineering
processSteps.description: Our engineers design a system tailored specifically to your home.

processSteps.title: Precision Install
processSteps.description: Clean, efficient installation by our in-house master electricians.

processSteps.title: Grid Activation
processSteps.description: Final testing, monitoring setup, and flip the switch to independence.

testimonials.quote: Aura made solar look like it was part of the original architectural plan. Truly impressive work.
testimonials.author: Marcus V.

testimonials.quote: Total energy independence. My Tesla Powerwall has already saved us during two major outages.
testimonials.author: Sarah L.

faqs.question: How long does a typical installation take?
faqs.answer: Most residential projects are completed within 3 to 5 days once permits are secured.

faqs.question: Will solar work on my specific roof type?
faqs.answer: We work with standing seam metal, slate, and flat roofs using specialized mounting systems.

service_area.travel_note: We serve the greater tri-state area for architectural solar projects.
